summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MIR4 Account Manager application. Backend APIs fully functional (12/12 tests passed). Frontend UI working excellently with complete CRUD operations, statistics display, and boss price configuration. Minor form validation improvements needed for negative number handling.

minor_issues.issue: Backend accepts negative values for boss quantities and gold without validation
minor_issues.impact: Users can enter negative numbers which may cause calculation issues

minor_issues.issue: HTML min='0' attribute doesn't prevent typing negative numbers in all browsers
Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with correct title and statistics
Account creation via modal with all fields
Real-time UI updates after CRUD operations
